{{velocity}} #if ($xwiki.hasAdminRights()) #set($void = $xwiki.jsx.use("WikiImporter.JSX")) #set($importerType = $!{request.wikiimporter} ) #set($mwimporter = $services.wikiimporter.getWikiImporter($importerType)) #set($mwimpdesc = $mwimporter.getDescriptor()) ## {{info}}$mwimpdesc.getName() - $mwimpdesc.getDescription(){{/info}} #if($mwimpdesc.getParameterDescriptorMap().isEmpty()) **No parameters** #else #set($allProducts = $mwimpdesc.getParameterDescriptorMap()) {{html}}
## Hidden Fields
#foreach($parameter in $allProducts.values())

#if ($parameter.type.name == "java.lang.Boolean" || $parameter.type.name == "boolean") #else #end

#end
